field.label: Listening interfaces
field.help: Select all the interfaces to enable NetFlow on.

field.label: WAN interfaces
field.help: Select interfaces used for WAN traffic to avoid counting NAT traffic twice.

field.label: Capture local
field.help: Collect NetFlow data on this firewall for use with Insight. Note that the local cache only holds the latest 100 MB of data.

field.label: Destinations
field.help: Select destinations to send NetFlow data to (ip address:port, eg 192.168.0.1:2550).

field.label: Active Timeout
field.help: Split long running flows into smaller parts.

field.label: Interface Totals History (30 sec.)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 30 sec. resolution. Default is 86400 sec. (24 hours).

field.label: Interface Totals History (5 min.)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 300 sec. resolution. Default is 604800 sec. (7 days).

field.label: Interface Totals History (1 hour)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for 3600 sec. resolution. Default is 2678400 sec. (31 days).

field.label: Interface Totals History (24 hours)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 86400 sec. resolution. Default is 31536000 sec. (365 days).

field.label: Destinations Ports Totals History (5 min.)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 300 sec. resolution. Default is 3600 sec. (1 hour).

field.label: Destinations Ports Totals History (1 hour)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 3600 sec. resolution. Default is 86400 sec. (24 hours).

field.label: Destinations Ports Totals History (24 hours)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 86400 sec. resolution. Default is 31536000 sec. (365 days).

field.label: Source Address Totals History (5 min.)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 300 sec. resolution. Default is 3600 sec. (1 hour).

field.label: Source Address Totals History (1 hour)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 3600 sec. resolution. Default is 86400 sec. (24 hours).

field.label: Source Address Totals History (24 hours)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 86400 sec. resolution. Default is 31536000 sec. (365 days).

field.label: Source Address Details History (24 hours)
field.help: Seconds of history to keep for the 86400 sec. resolution. Default is 5356800 sec. (62 days).
